name: NFL Oakland Raiders 3 Greatest Games: Super Bowl Victories (Full Frame)

reviews.name: NFL Oakland Raiders 3 Greatest Games: Super Bowl Victories (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: NFL films did quite the hack job on the games.They do not show complete games ! I have got the same games on Ebay and trade sites from just fans that had taped the game that had better quality and complete games.Oh they also exclude pregame , halftime and the post game so I guess the trophy presentation was not a big deal.What a rip and a half done put together set.......
reviews.title: I'm Surprised !

reviews.name: NFL Oakland Raiders 3 Greatest Games: Super Bowl Victories (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: Great DVD's ! After 32 years, Super Bowl XI was fun to watch! My favorite Super Bowl was Super Bowl XV! A great copy of all 3 games! All 3 for a little more than $19.00 is awesome!! Warning to anyone under 40,TV was different in the late 70's,so Super Bowl XI looks a little washed out to you youngsters! But take it from me, it is a great copy!
reviews.title: 08 June 2009

reviews.name: NFL Oakland Raiders 3 Greatest Games: Super Bowl Victories (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText:
ordered a couple more ( for my sons )
didn't mind the rarely shown faulty vision
majority of it was nice
didn't care about pre-game post-game stuff
this is great to just sit and watch "the game"
which is the reason i bought it
enjoyed "every" minute of it !
reviews.title: very good, i think !
